WORK_001.name: Grand Alfheim
WORK_001.description: The cutting-edge MMORPG being developed on the Roblox platform. Inspired by the captivating world of Alfheim Online from the popular anime series Sword Art Online, our project is a labor of love and imagination.
WORK_001.contribution: River System, Housing System, UX-UI Import, TeleportHouse, etc...

WORK_002.name: Moonsire
WORK_002.description: Dive into Moonsire, a dark fantasy RPG inspired by titans like Elden Ring and Dark Souls. Experience a single-player and multiplayer adventure with intense boss fights and action-focused gameplay where your choices truly matter.
WORK_002.contribution: Full DataStoring System (health, armor, inventory, location), GUI with multi-slot save system & GamePass integration, Robust inventory system with per-slot data, Permanent Death system with data wipe consequences
